Class User

java.lang.Object
org.Code.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the library system. A user may be a normal member, an administrator, or a librarian. Users store personal information, login credentials, borrowed book history, and fine information.

The class also includes helper methods for fine calculation, status checks, and book limits. Users can be associated with overdue books through the FileControler utilities.

    User(String firstName, String lastName, String username, String email, String password, String[] books)
    Creates a new User with complete profile and a list of borrowed books.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String lastName, String username, String email, String password, String[] books)
      Creates a new User with complete profile and a list of borrowed books.
      Parameters:
      firstName - user's first name
      lastName - user's last name
      username - unique username used for login
      email - user's email address
      password - login password
      books - array of borrowed book identifiers (may be empty)

    • User

      public User(String firstName, String lastName, String username, String email, String password)
      Creates a new User without borrowed book information. Initializes the books array as empty.
      Parameters:
      firstName - user's first name
      lastName - user's last name
      username - unique username
      email - user's email
      password - login password
